Text: This works great!  The "Reloaded" torrent with all the seeds/leechers can't be a real RELOADED version.  This one works GREAT and no messing with the Yuplay.exe file (where all the viruses are in the Reloaded version).  I checked this torrent with Security Essentials, MBAM, Emsisoft Anti-Malware, and SuperAntiSpyware.  Nothing found... Plus I've been playing it without a hiccup.  Please support the software developers and buy it if you can.  $50 is a bit high I think for a downloadable-only choppa game, but I am definitely going to buy it when the price drops!  Game On!
